channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
Correct me if Im wrong, and i'm not judging anyone who does this. Lets say i love playing a game, yet I'd like the game to be a bit more fun, so i find out ways to alter codes within the game (an online game) so itd be more challenging or even more easy. So after Getting the codes the way i want them to be, I realize I shouldn't disrupt other players way of fun of playing the game the original way it was intended. so I create my own server, A private one for me and my friends. Seeing as its not a game i created from scratch, but a game i downloaded and tweaked with it a bit to my liking, is this considered hacking? i personally believe so, but in all honesty is it? you know seeing as it wasn't mine to begin with and me just tweaking it a bit. I am playing on my own server and all, but is this a FORM of hacking?
PS please dont sugar coat the answer. i wont get offended and it wont make me change my mind about the way i play my videogames.

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @alexc37 alexc37
